title: Successful login with valid CPF and password
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully using a valid CPF and corresponding password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter a valid CPF
Enter the correct password corresponding to the CPF
Click the login button
Confirm that the user is authenticated and redirected to the dashboard

title: Login failure with invalid CPF
description: Verify that login fails with a non-existent CPF and an appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter an invalid/non-registered CPF
Enter any password
Click the login button
Check that login is rejected with an error indicating invalid credentials

title: Login failure with wrong password
description: Verify login fails when a valid CPF is entered with an incorrect password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter a valid CPF
Enter an incorrect password
Click the login button
Verify that login fails with an appropriate error message

title: Role-based access control enforcement
description: Verify that after login, users have access only to features permitted by their role.

steps.description: Login as a general user
Verify that restricted admin features are not accessible
Login as an administrator
Verify full access to system administration features

title: Successful logout invalidates session
description: Ensure that upon logout, session is destroyed and user is redirected to login screen.

steps.description: Login successfully
Click the logout button
Verify user is redirected to login page
Navigate back to dashboard URL
Confirm access is denied and user is required to login again

title: Password recovery with valid CPF and email
description: Verify password recovery process succeeds when valid CPF and associated email are provided.

steps.description: Navigate to password recovery page
Enter valid CPF and registered email address
Submit recovery request
Confirm recovery email or instructions are sent

title: Password recovery fails with invalid CPF
description: Verify that password recovery request fails when entering a non-registered CPF.

steps.description: Navigate to password recovery page
Enter an unregistered CPF
Submit recovery request
Verify that an error message is shown indicating CPF not found

title: Dashboard displays institutional news, agenda events, and notifications
description: Validate that after login, the dashboard shows current news, upcoming events, resource reservations, and personal notifications correctly.

steps.description: Login as a general user
Verify that institutional news are displayed
Verify agenda shows current and upcoming events
Verify personal notifications are shown

title: Create and manage agenda events with resource reservation
description: Verify authorized users can create events with resource reservations (e.g., projector, notebook) and events appear correctly on agenda.

steps.description: Login as an admin or authorized agenda manager
Create a new agenda event with resource reservation for projector
Confirm event appears in agenda
Check that a corresponding IT support ticket is automatically created for the hardware reservation
Verify that the IT ticket is linked to the resource reservation

title: Prevent double booking of the same resource
description: Verify the system prevents multiple reservations for the same resource at overlapping times.

steps.description: Book a resource (e.g., projector) for a specific time slot
Attempt to book the same resource for a conflicting/overlapping time
Verify reservation is rejected with an appropriate conflict message

title: Access and view digital HR documents securely
description: Ensure employees can securely access their HR digital documents such as paystubs via the HR module.

steps.description: Login as an employee
Navigate to HR documents section
Verify valid paystub documents are listed and accessible

title: Time tracking (ponto) with supervisor validation
description: Verify employee time clock entries are correctly recorded and require supervisor approval.

steps.description: Login as an employee
Record clock-in time
Confirm time entry is saved pending supervisor approval
Login as the supervisor
Approve or reject employee time entries
Verify employees see approved time entries reflected in their records

title: Send and receive targeted HR messages
description: Ensure HR can send messages to selected employees and recipients receive and view the messages properly.

steps.description: Login as HR personnel
Compose and send targeted message to a specific employee
Login as the employee
Confirm message is received and readable

title: Submit and track IT support tickets
description: Verify users can submit IT support tickets, track their status in real-time, and IT staff can update ticket progress.

steps.description: Login as a general user
Submit a new IT support ticket describing an issue
Verify ticket is created with appropriate status
Login as IT staff
Update ticket status (e.g., In Progress, Resolved)
Confirm updates are reflected correctly for the user

title: Search and read knowledge base technical articles
description: Verify users can search for and access IT knowledge base articles with relevant content.

steps.description: Navigate to IT knowledge base
Perform a search using keywords
Verify relevant articles matching search are listed
Open an article
Confirm article content loads fully and is readable

title: Enroll in an education course and complete lessons and assessments
description: Ensure learners can enroll in courses, view video lessons, take quizzes or exams, and receive completion certificates automatically.

steps.description: Login as a learner
Browse and enroll in an available course
Confirm enrollment is successful and course is listed
Complete all video lessons
Take the integrated quizzes/exams
Verify scores are recorded and a completion certificate is generated automatically

title: Handle maintenance and hospital equipment service requests
description: Verify users can submit service requests for maintenance and hospital equipment, track status, and receive updates.

steps.description: Login as a general user
Submit a new maintenance or CEH equipment service request
Confirm request creation with correct initial status
Track request progress and status updates
Verify updates are displayed correctly and timely

title: Post and display corporate mural announcements
description: Ensure authorized users can post announcements on the mural and they are displayed correctly to all users.

steps.description: Login as an authorized announcement manager
Post a new announcement with title and content
Verify the announcement appears on mural for all users

title: Send and receive direct inter-user messages
description: Verify users can send direct messages to other users and recipients receive and can read these messages.

steps.description: Login as User A
Send a direct message to User B
Login as User B
Verify User B receives and can read the message from User A

title: Display and refresh staff birthday listings correctly
description: Verify the staff birthday list displays upcoming birthdays accurately and updates daily.

steps.description: Navigate to birthday listings
Verify staff birthdays within current date range are displayed correctly
Change system date to next day
Confirm birthday listings refresh and update appropriately

title: Prevent SQL injection in login input fields
description: Verify that input validation and sanitization prevent SQL injection attacks on login CPF and password fields.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter SQL injection code in CPF field (e.g., ' OR 1=1 -- )
Enter SQL injection or harmless string in password
Click login
Validate that login is rejected and no SQL injection occurs

title: Validate secure password reset with token
description: Verify that password reset requires a valid token sent via email and expires after set time.

steps.description: Request password reset for a valid CPF
Retrieve password reset token
Use valid token within expiration time to set a new password
Verify password is updated successfully
Attempt password reset using expired token
Verify reset is rejected due to token expiration

title: Administrator manages users, sectors, and permissions
description: Verify admin users can create, update, delete users, sectors, and set role-based permissions correctly.

steps.description: Login as administrator
Create a new user with specific role and sector
Confirm user is listed and can login with assigned role
Edit sector information
Verify changes are saved and reflected
Modify user permissions
Confirm permission changes affect user access accordingly

title: Audit log captures key system actions
description: Verify that system audit logs record user logins, configuration changes, and resource reservations accurately.

steps.description: Perform user login, agenda resource reservation, and admin configuration changes
Access audit logs as administrator
Verify all performed actions are logged with correct timestamps and user details

title: Input sanitization in form submissions
description: Verify input fields across modules properly sanitize input to prevent XSS and other injection attacks.

steps.description: Attempt to submit form fields with scripts or malicious input (e.g., <script>alert(1)</script>)
Confirm inputs are sanitized and no scripts execute or harmful effects occur
